title: WANTED: Graded A-2.5 Johnson, Mathewson, Cobb, Young
author: MLB535

posts.post_title: WANTED: Graded A-2.5 Johnson, Mathewson, Cobb, Young
posts.post_content:
I had a few purchases in place two weeks ago that fell through while on vacation.

I am looking for the following players graded A - 2.5 

- Walter Johnson
- Christy Mathewson
- Ty Cobb
- Cy Young


Obviously I am not looking to spend heavily since I am asking for a lower grade card.

Please let me know what you have and what you are looking for, price wise. I would like to buy at least 2 cards over the next three days, but again, it comes down to what dollar values are floating around.

To be clear, I am only looking to add this into my PC. I am not a seller, I do not trade. I simply look for cards that I can afford to place into my collections.

Any help would be greatly appreciated!
You haven't thrown the towel in on the "Ruth, DiMaggio, Gehrig for $220, " thread, have you?
